name: iSpiice Volunteering pvt.ltd
overview:
Volunteer India with iSpiice. Blend rewarding volunteer work India, cultural immersion and adventure volunteer travel in India programs.

iSpiice (Integrated Social Programs in Indian Child Education) are an Indian based volunteer organisation located in Dharamsala, north Volunteer holding child India.

iSpiice welcome volunteer participants from all over the world to join our expanding programs; to help address inequalities in the provision of education; to share skills and experiences with local people and to help in the care of India’s children.

Whilst offering a valuable platform for cultural exchange, programs also give the opportunity for adventure travel in India. Once the volunteering week is done, join iSpiice on scheduled trips visiting the Taj Mahal, the Golden Temple or trekking in the Himalayan Mountains.

Experience life in India with iSpiice and discover how you can make a difference today.
